author: Special Correspondent
text:
: A CR-Digital X-ray facility was commissioned at the Ramakrishna Mission Charitable Dispensary in the city. Srimat Swami Bhaktikamanandaji Maharaj, president, Sri Ramakrishna Math, Coimbatore, commissioned the new facility at a brief function held at the hospital premises recently.

The hospital doctors P. Ravikumar, K. Srinivasa Raghavan and R. Dhanasekaran, spoke explaining the salient features of the new facility.
title: Digital X-ray facility commissioned
